website_summaries.verdict: Though this spray is slow-acting, it kills fleas thoroughly and keeps them out.
pros: This spray has minimal scent and is effective at eliminating intense infestations
The spray can be directly applied to beds and furniture with no risk of stains
Kills fleas at all stages of life, and works against ticks as well
cons: Uses toxic chemicals that may be harmful to pets

customer_reviews.title: It does the job quicly and effectively.
customer_reviews.text: Adams solved the problem when the natural product barely helped at all. I started with the best of intentions for the "all natural" route and bought Cedarcide. Although it helped some right when I sprayed it, the next day I'd be spraying again because the fleas were right back. So much for kills and repels. I tried for a couple of weeks thinking maybe it would slowly pare them down, but it never did. The dogs were miserable and so was I, so it was time to give up on "all natural" and solve the problem. Sprayed the same rooms and furniture with Adams and haven't had a problem since.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I was getting unknown bug bites and some irritation on my skin whenever I sat on my loveseat, so I had to look for a solution without throwing away the furniture. I searched on Amazon and I was happy to found this spray. I was even happier after I read in the description that this spray also kills other bugs and insects. After applying just once on my loveseat (remember to follow the instructions and stay away from the area for at least one hour), I stopped getting bites and irritations on my skin! Whatever was inside the furniture was killed by the spray. I'll definitely continue to use this spray on all my furniture and my carpets.
customer_reviews.author: J.U.

customer_reviews.title: A complete waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: I picked this product because it had 5 star reviews. I'm so disappointed because my dog died over a week ago and to combat the remaining fleas we've been spraying this product over everything -- I wake up feeling fleas jumping all along my body with fresh new bites. I found a flea on my shoulder, grabbed it, and sprayed this stuff directly on it and the flea still continued to remain alive and active. Maybe it takes a few minutes to die, but it simply doesn't work. I feel very defeated spending my money on products that don't work.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: but it's a terrific product. Good price
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! Gets rid of all the fleas. Takes about 2 weeks to be completely flea-free, but it's a terrific product. Good price, too, and agood delivery time form the vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Running Bear

customer_reviews.title: Smells really strong on a bad way... Raid smells better
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in a rush to get something in the meantime since I realize there is a short window of opportunity when you see one flea... I sprayed it in my living room 5 hrs ago and it still stinks...who knows it may work but I decided to order Raid instead which surprisingly smelled a lot better and didn’t leak. So I’ll be returning this product...*** btw I saw a lot of 1 Star comments about ppl throwing it away due to dismay.... hello people you realize you can return these products and get your money back lol... just saying***
customer_reviews.author: Jess S.

customer_reviews.title: Ok for some relief in crisis
customer_reviews.text: Helped some, but not much. Killed what live ones I could find quickly, however didn't prevent recurrence or any sort of continued coverage past the initial use. Wouldn't recommend buying this for anything other than a quick source of help in a crisis mode, but due to the potential toxicity of the chemicals, wouldn't want to use in my home or around my pets more than once or twice.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Odorless (to me) and fine mist spray
customer_reviews.text: I've used this a couple of times since purchased....We have a cat in Florida, and fleas love him. I spray our rugs and doorways....Haven't noticed the fleas like we used to. Cat still has them....Adv antage 2 helps (a little) to keep them at bay. Adams has no odor to us....and has a very fine mist sprayer, to cover the area better. You're never gonna be flea free in Florida....when you have pets. You need to spray your yard....apply flea medicine to your pet...and, have a way to keep them outta the house....this seems to take care of that part of the flea problem.
customer_reviews.author: Solerider

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, (caution if Birds, Fish, or Reptiles in home)
customer_reviews.text: Do not use near birds! This hits all the buttons on the bug life cycle and was highly recommended. It quickly cleared up fleas that Fluffy brought home from the high grass by the pond. She got a collar, her "area" got a spray, and in two weeks, nothing on her flea comb ever to be seen again. Follow instructions, the label opens like a book, read both pages! * Do not use near pet birds, fish, or reptiles.
customer_reviews.author: Loyal_Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just wait, it WILL work
customer_reviews.text: We had a concentration of fleas in one area rug and nothing would help, salt, vacuuming, nothing! Finally I ordered Adams and sprayed before bedtime and let it dry overnight, the next day, still fleas, but by the third day, nothing, not a flea in sight and it kills eggs too. They have not come back since. Finally flea free!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: It smells fine, is easier to use, and is cheaper than in store... however, I haven’t noticed it helping with killing or preventing fleas or ticks for that matter.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley V.

customer_reviews.title: Basically poison!! Read instructions before you buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Any shampoo or spay that warms that if it gets on you at all, you should call poison control, is NEVER anything I’d want to put on my dog!! Read the instructions before you buy!! I didn’t and regretted it, I’ve wasted my money and it’s not even worth returning. All it did is make me freak out mid bath when I realized we were both covered in poison.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Didn't 100% get rid of fleas
customer_reviews.text: We've been using the Home Spray along with the carpet spray, for the past 2 weeks or so, and am still finding fleas on my dog. While it doesn't seem to be as many fleas, I would have thought using an entire can of carpet spray over the course of that time, in addition with this, would have irradiated the issue. The smell is god awful, and last forever as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris94

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell but strong if you add too much
customer_reviews.text: Only thing that finally helped us get rid of the stupid fleas in our home, that and shampoo'ing our cat every other day, flea brush daily and vacuuming every where....we had a very bad break out.
customer_reviews.author: Mbrown

customer_reviews.title: THIS WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: After a long battle with fleas (they are the worst this year!!), we almost gave up. We tried boric acid, powders, sprays, the light trap... everything! I read the reviews on this and decided to try it because the price was so reasonable. This spray completely helped in our "hot spot" room. We used the light top the next day and there were about three baby fleas in there, which was a HUGE improvement from the infestation we have had over the past few weeks. We are buying our second bottle now and will keep this on hand!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective on Fleas
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product based on positive reviews. We weren't disappointed. We have two dogs and this year, for the first time, they picked up some fleas which then got into our house. We purchased flea collars for the dogs. However, that resulted in the fleas becoming more aggressive in attacking us humans. we experienced Used as directed, Adam's Flea & Tick Home Spray has been very effective in eliminating the fleas from furniture and carpets. It is easy to apply and seems to leave no stains or noticeable residue.
customer_reviews.author: M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Is Not effective in the slightest
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this product in the past and it worked great. I don't know if it's the supplier or just a different formula now but it does not work at all. And as far as I'm concerned smell and ease-of-use does not matter at all if it doesn't work
customer_reviews.author: Pristine Palace

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for our needs.
customer_reviews.text: Not to impressed with this. I used it on my dog but it didn't work at all. I'm not too keen on putting poison in my dog anyways, but needed to get rid of these pesky fleas that were causing her so much grief. Used it a few times then stopped, because it did nothing to kill them. Didn't work for us
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Follow directions and works very well!
customer_reviews.text: I had a huge flea infestation, and this ended up being the key to saving my sanity. I kept the cats out of the room I sprayed until it was completely dry/aired out. Then I would switch rooms. Over the next few days I noticed that the fleas appeared to be gone, and that the cats and I were itch-free! :) (PS... I also combined with topical flea agent for kitties :)
customer_reviews.author: Anomalee

customer_reviews.title: Adam's is not the same as Adam's Plus.
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered Adam's Plus 32oz in the past . Great product. This time I reordered, but it's not the same quality. I just realized it is not "plus" . I guess, not the same strength.Also is only 24 oz. Not happy with it. Next order I will make sure is the right one, if I get anything else I will return it.
customer_reviews.author: JEILY RUSSO

customer_reviews.title: Great effective product!
customer_reviews.text: Most effective flea product on the market, great value in comparison to other products. My husband is a general contractor who flips houses and recently had to deal with a yukky bedbugs issue in a messy home even after exterminator came—he found that Adams spray even kills bedbugs on contact! We used to own a dog boarding kennel and we tried many dog flea sprays through the years but always came back to this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Darci E

customer_reviews.title: No fleas
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs and was having quite a time with fleas in the bedroom (my fur babies sleep with me). I tried diatomaceous earth, but that didn't seem to do much. Then I tried this Adams home spray. Sprayed the entire floor, bed skirt, drapes, even the dirty laundry just to be sure. No more fleas now. And the spray didn't discolor anything like other products warn, all my fabrics were unharmed. I will buy this again when it's time to re-treat.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Stover

customer_reviews.title: Wasted my hard hard earned money.
customer_reviews.text: I was so optimistic... the reviews really made me pull the trigger on this home flea spray.... needless to say it did not work a lick... I even sprayed directly on the fleas in my dogs bed and they just kept on Moving they never left from the dog bed... I literally sprayed almost the whole bottle in one bedroom (my bedroom) and still did not work!!! We don’t even have an infestation nothing to extreme but I AM TIRED OF THESE FLEAS
customer_reviews.author: Lena Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Kills on contact
customer_reviews.text: A nice strong pet spray. The bottles don't last that long for the price. But it's definitely a good product. The shipping was quick as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shaungabby

customer_reviews.title: Best for all bugs
customer_reviews.text: This is the best for fleas and also kills all bugs like spider and ants around the house and does not have much odor so it can be used on furniture and anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: John Coleman

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: Tried so many powders, sprays until came across this one. Read reviews and decide to buy it. Amazing product for inside and outside (have to buy separate for outdoor) Adams flea and home spray + Seresto flea collar is perfect combination for our house of 11 cat's. Now we don't have bites anymore and our cat's are clean. You have to spend money,if you want to go cheap it's not gonna work!
customer_reviews.author: spomenka

customer_reviews.title: Works like it should.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only flea spray I've found that actually works. I light spray on the carpets in the house and within 6 hours the fleas are dead. You have to retreat once a week for a couple of weeks because the eggs keep hatching, but after three treatments my house has been flea free for months now.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kerstann

customer_reviews.title: the spray top was a little brittle
customer_reviews.text: Disliked that after one use I broke the spray top by squeezing the trigger while it was in the locked position. I had to replace the spray top from another household item that didn't disburse the spray as I'd like. The spray did seem to work but it is tough to tell. Still have fleas but not in one area that I treated with the spray. Maybe I just have to spray more and in more places.
customer_reviews.author: David Blumer

customer_reviews.title: Works as stated! Fleas be gone!
customer_reviews.text: Was pet sitting a friends dog and noticed a few fleas after watching them. All my animals are on flea meds, but was worried there might be more fleas/eggs in our house, so ordered this to be safe. **Make sure to read before using and follow all directions. We sprayed, then left our house all day. It smells, but it's poison, so to be expected. We came back and no more fleas. Product works.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Loo

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs are 16 and 8 and we've never had fleas until this year. We tried everything and couldn't get in front of it, I wanted to sell the house and move (just kidding). We tried so many different products and sprays and they would last for about 2 days. We tried this along with monthly drops and we haven't had a single flea now for 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jonlyn

customer_reviews.title: Works Great (and Fast)!
customer_reviews.text: I had a hotel room that had fleas from a dog that must have been in the room prior to my stay. I did not want to move my stuff as I was in an extended-stay type hotel. I ordered this for next-day delivery and sprayed the entire room. Floors, Curtains, anything accessible. Fleas were gone that evening. No smell or residue.
customer_reviews.author: James Tibbetts

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken and didnt work
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken so it didnt spray right and dripped all over. Also it didnt kill fleas, i set up a lamp and soapy water and i caught fleas still.
customer_reviews.author: Jarbells

customer_reviews.title: Why the fleas biting me while I wash the dishes? Never had this problem before.
customer_reviews.text: Lived in my condo by the beach, clean for 17 years. No pets, no animals in the house yet the damn fleas are now biting my legs by the kitchen sink when I wash the dishes! Don't make no F'ing sense... So I sprayed the area a few nights...Whatever it was is gone but what could it have been? No dogs were allowed here...hmmm.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph B.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps flea and ticks away—
customer_reviews.text: It works. We have a couple of feral cats that have taken up residence in our 3 season room. We noticed 1 had a flea, so I bought this and spray the room....so far no fleas. I also dosed both of them with flea and tick meds. They have decided they like it here, which is kinda cool. Good product, does what it’s supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it works
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed the cat tree everywhere with this thing. Then I sprayed the bathroom with this. I assumed that the chemicals in this spray would kill fleas and their eggs and whatnot but I guess not. 3 days later, I put a Victor flea trap in the bathroom and 4 fleas jumped their way into the sticky pad. I'm giving it 3 stars because I guess it's possible that the spray killed some? I'm being hopeful.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Kills fleas
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this by must, meant to get the one that sprays directly on animals! I decided to keep it and try it. I sprayed their weddings and the floors and have seen an improvement! Fleas are bad this year and between this and Adams for pets we are keeping them under control! The smell is not the best but it goes away quickly. Does not seem to leave any residue on their beds.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Minor

customer_reviews.title: You can consider buying
customer_reviews.text: When I received the package and opened it, there was a problem with the bottle. The liquid inside kept flowing and it was everywhere. Very angry. Because I did n’t want to increase the burden on the delivery staff during the epidemic, and there was no printer, I would n’t return the product. If there is no problem with the bottle , It feels good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Avoid at all cost, get DE instead
customer_reviews.text: Smells horrible, did not work even with direct contact, and the spray nozzle was faulty... It leaked liquid far more than it sprayed and was overall a horrible experience/decision to get.
customer_reviews.author: Zaurius

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product in my dogs bed area, to keep it fresh and one step ahead of any fleas or ticks that may try to appear. This product has worked well because since my dog goes outside during the day, and he comes in at night, I have not noticed any ticks or fleas on his bedding. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: sfabil01

customer_reviews.title: Replacement
customer_reviews.text: This above order came leaking as per attached photos. I just received my order, but much to my displeasure the contents (milky substance) has leaked out onto the plastic bag it was enclosed into, plus the end of the box where the spray nozzle is located. The top, sides and the bottom of the box is wet with it, it actually reeks of the insecticide. Please let me know what can be done to rectify this?
customer_reviews.author: Malik P.

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I was at a loss on what to do because I had my cat on flea medicine and these indestructible fleas would not die!! I kept getting bit every single night. I bought this thinking it would not work but was willing to try anything. I am now on week 2 of spraying this product everywhere in my home and I have not been bite once!
customer_reviews.author: A Resendiz

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the fleas at bay..
customer_reviews.text: Works well but just keeps them at bay. If you want to fully rid them go for the PT spray. This worked but didn’t eradicate them fully.
customer_reviews.author: Court

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works well. in a 1 bedroom condo it did about 3/4 of the home with 1 bottle. It doesn't go as far as i assumed but it seems to do the job pretty well. We do find fleas in the following days of the spraying so i cannot determine how long after you put it on it works but i doubt it is for and entire month or whatever it says. I'm sure it kills live fleas on contact though.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty

customer_reviews.title: We had a big flea problem in our carpets, NOT ANYMORE
customer_reviews.text: Needed a product that could kill all the fleas in my carpet. Was about to get the vets flea spray but I saw this had a lot more reviews and close to five stars. I did have to sprinkle my whole carpet with borax then vacuum it afterwards. Then I used the spray and so far we haven't had any bug problems anymore just like that.
customer_reviews.author: TheGoofyAsian

customer_reviews.title: Kills bugs but may be dangerous to pets
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after finding fleas on my pet. I wish I'd of known how toxic it can be. I don't know if it's safe/approved...if I look it up I get a warning saying this has been discontinued and to toss it. The ingredients are pretty tough insecticides. So they will work to kill pests. After reading more, I don't know about the safety of this for dogs and wouldn't recommend. It worked but I wish I'd of done my homework first.
customer_reviews.author: al pal

customer_reviews.title: The best stuff but read the label.
customer_reviews.text: We use this stuff at work (a groom shop) and we recommend this as a home (read: NOT to be used on animals) treatment. So, when i found some nasty fleas at home, I immediately bought this stuff and glad I did. Sprayed it and followed up with vacuuming a few days later.
customer_reviews.author: Sara King

customer_reviews.title: THIS WORKSSSSSS!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked when I had tried all of other natural solutions for my flea infestation. I have three cats one of which is a long hair domestic and it was hell getting rid of all the fleas in my fully carpeted apartment. After one week we all found relief.
customer_reviews.author: Christina D. D.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I used this product on every piece of furniture, curtains, carpet, rugs and bedding and could not tell a difference in the amount of fleas. I used this product years ago and it worked great. The formula obviously is not the same anymore. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Duvall

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Product came just as described. Works well and sprays a fine even mist. Smells a bit strong like alcohol, but overall wasn’t too bad. We’ve had a bad flea problem for about a month now. Can’t say this got rid of them, but it definitely helped and gave us peace of mind to be able to spray over furniture and rugs.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: For mosquito control on patio
customer_reviews.text: Use this on patio to keep mosquitoes away. We don’t use it on pets. We sprayed it on our patio rug.
customer_reviews.author: Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Seemed effective - used with other techniques
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to say if this was really effective - but it certainly didn't hurt paired with other methods of flea-attack. Our new kitten brought fleas with him, so we did a thorough spray with this. We also vacuumed obsessively and used Revolution Flea Medication - so not sure what did the most work, but regardless - fleas are gone. Whew!
customer_reviews.author: reader9996

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: I really cannot believe I have found a flea spray that all you do is spray it on an item and it works. Way too good to be true. Amazing and I recommend this product to anyone with a flea problem in their living space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it worked for our flea issue
customer_reviews.text: This helped a lot during a flea problem we recently had. We sprayed down our bedroom countless times and finally got rid of those things. Vacuuming was also crucial, make sure to get under EVERYTHING and spray often.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: This spray works, no doubt!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had multiple flea infestations inside the house from stray cats in the neighborhood (The kittens find their way inside through small hidden holes). In the past I’ve bombed the house with results taking a few days to take effect, and not to mention all the furniture needing to be wiped down was a drag. With this spray I simply sprayed the couch and all the carpet and within a few hours the flea bites were practically gone!! Definitely recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Serna

customer_reviews.title: Bedbugs
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works I used everything I could think of brought expensive products and DIY products and then my daughter seen this and brought it and after about a month of spraying every 5-7 days they were gone and haven't seen any since It doesn't smell bad like some chemical sprays do and the the money you pay makes it worth it. When you buy be sure to get Adams Flea & Tick Home Spray recommend this product to battle may bugs roaches, fleas from your pets and so much more
customer_reviews.author: Penny S Litman

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome! I spray it in corners that I can’t reach with the vacuum & also spray it where my cat sleeps cuz he’s an indoor/outdoor cat and though I give him flea medicine (the oil on the back of his neck) this stuff works great if you’ve ever had fleas indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Idk why it asks for thickness lol its a spray and it worked great! We rescued a cat who was covered in fleas and gave them to our other cat. They were ALL over the apartment. I vacuumed religiously and treated the whole apartment twice with still some to spare in the bottle. That paired with treating the cats with cheristen got rid of everything!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica213

customer_reviews.title: Great product and a bottle lasts a good while
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for 10+ years and if I could give it 10 stars I would. It's just about the only thing we've found that kills fleas and their eggs around the home. We use it on the carpets and furniture in conjunction with Advantage 2 on our cats to make sure there isn't a reinfestation. The smell is really strong but fades away pretty quickly. It can be used to treat clothing and bedding but I use Natural Care + to treat that since it is a little gentler.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Allen

customer_reviews.title: No itching thank you
customer_reviews.text: My neighbor has a dog doesn't take care of a very well This product helps very much thank you
customer_reviews.author: Steven a ross

customer_reviews.title: Godd product and great customer service too!
customer_reviews.text: This product is almost odorless and the company's customer support is awesome. There was a problem with one of the bottles causing a mess when it leaked beyond its protective bag and even soaked the shipping box, but they immediately resolved the issue. I'm very appreciative of their superior customer service and the product is exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cats know something is there
customer_reviews.text: Sprayed 3 times, fleas on the run. Have sprayed each floor (1200 sq ft) and there's enough left for at least 2 more times. Works better than I hoped for and have 2nd bottle just in case.
customer_reviews.author: bmac32

customer_reviews.title: this works pretty good at keeping my house flea free as long ...
customer_reviews.text: this works pretty good at keeping my house flea free as long as I keep the drops up to date on my cats. I usually only end up using this about once or twice a year. so far it has worked better than any other products I have used.
customer_reviews.author: D. Olsen

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive and worked like a charm. Just misted over carpet and let it set for an hour. It did take 2 doses but killed every single flea. No heavy or lingering odor. Happy kitties and husband.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Eadie

customer_reviews.title: Ugh fleas
customer_reviews.text: My dog came home from my sisters house covered in fleas but I did not notice until I allowed her on the furniture. I order this immediately! I also bathed my dog in flea shampoo. I sprayed it all over my house and the fleas are no more!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. McCoslin

customer_reviews.title: Finally a product that works.
customer_reviews.text: The only flea and tick spray that we have found that actually works. We have tried the powders & other sprays and nothing worked inside the kennel. This stuff actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Roadracer

customer_reviews.title: Works quickly and effectively
customer_reviews.text: Works! Specifically used on area carpets and under beds. We have noticed that the indoor flea problem is finally under control. Would recommend using in tandem with yard spray and, of course, topical for your animal.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Something that works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had squirrels in my attic space and they brought fleas in. I treated with all natural product (vets best and wondercide) for THREE MONTHS, as well as vacuumed daily. After breaking down, I decided to try this. Sprayed it, waited overnight, and now I have been flea free for 4 days. Beyond happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Rice

customer_reviews.title: Never again.
customer_reviews.text: Sprayed this all over the dogs' beds, carpets, kennels, door ways, corners and edges and after the fact, the following couple of days were bad! Did not kill rather it seemed to have upset the fleas. The issue is now under control but this however didn't not seem to help at all.
customer_reviews.author: Britney Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Stops Fleas as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Not a big fan of toxic solutions to fleas from 2 small dogs and a cat BUT for a quick knockdown, this stuff works well.
customer_reviews.author: Daddiot3

customer_reviews.title: Works for more than fleas and ticks all kinds of bugs
customer_reviews.text: It works for all types of bugs and has a minty smell which I like and it's easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lauana F.

customer_reviews.title: waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.text: big disappointment. This stuff is not cheap. weeks have gone by and I still have fleas. I banished the cat to the out doors, sprayed every thing and every where. Vacuumed the house every day, I'm exhausted. and fed up with this stuff. I had purchased the shampoo and the pet spray all worthless and expensive.
customer_reviews.author: commercial tv- killer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Works great I've tried everything for fleas and this is good stuff. Watch out I have autoimmune issues and it did make me sick. But it go rid of the fleas
customer_reviews.author: kzemrose

customer_reviews.title: Best price around!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years in my grooming salon at the end of every day as part of the daily cleaning routine and I swear by it! This is the best price I've seen anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Chills

customer_reviews.title: CAUSED SEIZURES IN DOG
customer_reviews.text: After buying this we found out it caused seizures in a friends dog. Buyer beware. THE DOG DIED IN 2 DAYS. VET SAID DONT USE THIS!!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Product is ok I guess
customer_reviews.text: This product did not kill the fleas like I had expected. My dogs continued to scratch and I saw fleas all over my dogs. It probable cut down the population some. But not enough
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived leaking
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived leaking in plastic bag it was shipped in. Should send better in closed bottle with sprayer detached. Then customers can attach sprayer when ready to use. Hope it works. Given it three stars bc I do not know if it works or how much product I have left even.
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Works but not well
customer_reviews.text: It works but not well. It doesn't smell, it sprays easy enough, and it does work, but it claims 7 months protection and we got about 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy bottle and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Generous amount of product in a sturdy bottle. It still leaks a little bit when you spray it over a large area. But I'm OK with that. We have cat and always suspected there are fleas. It looks this product works.
customer_reviews.author: L Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Ive used this brand for years. Never a problem with fleas. Ever!
customer_reviews.author: Truvvy

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me. Trying another brand from the vet now.
customer_reviews.author: ReedMc

customer_reviews.title: Works but strong smell
customer_reviews.text: Works for sure but smell is heavy I had to wear a mask. Takes couple of hours for the smell to go away. But works great for fleas.
customer_reviews.author: Christiephelps

customer_reviews.title: So far so good I guess
customer_reviews.text: I will spray around our beds, in my car and the couches about every 4-5 days and so far we have not had ticks on us since. Hoping it continues!
customer_reviews.author: stonegyrl

customer_reviews.title: Do not work.
customer_reviews.text: I use it a few times in my house. It simply does not work. Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: IT ACTUALLY WORKS
customer_reviews.text: This partnered with 2 flea tick bombs, and a flea trap have ridden my apartment of fleas and it has been about 2 months now. My cat doesn't scratch anymore either. I've sprayed this spray twice since I got it and have been flea free ever since.
customer_reviews.author: jayvon turner

customer_reviews.title: Great product, no odor.
customer_reviews.text: Really has no odor and worked first time I sprayed it on carpet. I try to respray weekly to rugs and carpet. No issues with carpet discoloration and my schitzu doesn't even know it has been sprayed...no sneezing or coughing at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Adams
customer_reviews.text: Leaked out some in the plastic bag. Please make sure before placing liquids in a box for shipping that the lid is tightened.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I was beginning to develop a bit of a flea problem but this spray nipped it in the bud. Just make sure you apply the spray everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Terrified to use. Extreme Ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: I was terrified to use this in my home, based on the warnings covering the entire bottle. I decided to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Peach

customer_reviews.title: Works for lice
customer_reviews.text: Works for head lice!! I've been thru hell with lice before,where nothing work, this will kill them one time.
customer_reviews.author: maca peru

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than expected. Works for a wide variety of pests and bugs. Even bed bugs! And Raid for bed bugs costs a fortune.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Van Scoy

customer_reviews.title: What bug
customer_reviews.text: Are use two bottles for my entire lower half of my house and I have not seen a bug yet works awesome and it’s been one month
customer_reviews.author: Toyette Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Used in conjunctjon with daily vacuuming and the Adams carpet powder to kill fleas and my home is flea free. Woot!
customer_reviews.author: TineMachine

customer_reviews.title: Works when others dont
customer_reviews.text: Finding something effective that doesnt have Pyrethrins (toxic to cats) is a challenge. I was going to dock one star because the squeeze trigger was broken but that really isnt the fault of the product.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff will kill any kind of hard to kill pest! Greatest stuff ever. Been using for 40 years.
customer_reviews.author: Terry B. Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Does a really good job. I never actually saw fleas in my house but I kept finding them on my dogs. BEween this and the Adams dog spray I stopped seeing fleas in 24 hrs
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Too strong to be near my pet!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff burn my girl she got in tve way when i was spraying it..Took her hair out. I will never use again too strong..
customer_reviews.author: deborah h.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Using this as part of 3 step program and the program is working. Not taking any chances!
customer_reviews.author: Reader1961

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working well on flea-festation. Would have given a 5 but delivery was after promised dates.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Anything this product touches, it dies. The home spray kills ants and spiders instantly. Adams products have all worked well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ward

customer_reviews.title: Got fleas? Say no more
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, doesn't smell terrible, dries fast, and I've never had a problem with my way too many animals. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Curcio

customer_reviews.title: Was not impressed
customer_reviews.text: My nephew's cat brought fleas into the house giving it to the other animals. I used this on our carpets and floors to kill the fleas, but only made my two cats ill.
customer_reviews.author: history magent

product_meta.title: Adams Flea and Tick Home Spray, 24 Ounce
product_meta.description: Adams Flea and Tick Home Spray contains a unique combination of ingredients that kills pre-adult fleas before they grow up to bite. It reaches fleas hidden in carpets, rugs, upholstery, and pet bedding. It protects your home from flea build up, while protecting your pets and family from bites. Use in homes, garages, attics and apartments. One treatment gives continuous protection against pre-adult fleas for 7 months. Kills fleas, ticks, mosquitoes, cockroaches, ants, earwigs, silverfish and other labeled insects.
feature_bullets: Effectively kills fleas, flea eggs, flea larvae, bed bugs, ticks, cockroaches, ants, spiders, mosquitoes and many other labeled insects
Contains an insect growth regulatory (IGR) to kill flea eggs and larvae to help prevent reinfestation for up to 7 full months
For home use only; do not spray directly on pets
